column2: Laporan Pilihanraya Umum 2004, EC's Scoresheet results, https://undi.info/, Keith Rozario Github.

DUN Constituency Names follow the EC's Scoresheet results. Barisan Alternatif is made up of PAS, PKR, and PRM. The EC Scoresheet wrongly associated Rayner Francis Udong (DUN Bingkor) with DAP. EC affixed errorneous majority value for DUN Likas (claiming it is 3993) and DUN Tanjong Batu (claiming it is 5784). 2004_DUN_CANDIDATE_NOTES file shows which candidates require sex category verification. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
Unique Identifier. For this case, it is the Parliamentary Code
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank

Total Elector count using 2004 Elections which was built on 2003 electoral roll certified on 2nd March 2004 except the four constituencies (Bachok, Tanah Merah, Jeli, and Kuala Krai) where electoral roll up to 30th September 2003 was utilized
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total Number of Ballot Papers issued at the poll (including postal ballot papers issued to voters and rejected ballot papers but excluding spoilt ballot papers)
Number of ballots papers issued but no returned (including postal ballot papers)
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
Barisan Nasional Valid Vote for the Candidate
